description_english: Abundance of the tagged species; 0 - 10, TMTT (too many to tag), or CI1, CI2, CI3 for amphibians
Audio quality of the task (0 - 11)
Comments on the acoustic tag
Confidence in the identification of the tag (Confident, To Be Checked, Unknown - Far)
Average chronic industrial noise at the task level
Method the recording was processed as
Vocalization type (Song, Call, Non-vocal) in minute interval 0
time interval in which the individual was first detected. Options are 0-1 min; 1-2 min; 2-3 min; 3-4 min; 4-5 min; 5-6 min; 6-7 min; 7-8 min; 8-9 min; 9-10 min
Average background noise at the task level
Average rain at the task level
The date of the recording (YYYY-MM-DD)
The time of the recording (HH:MM:SS)
Species code (American Ornithological Society four-letter short code assigned to species for ARU tagging)
Distinct individual of a species
The user who transcribed the recording
Average wind at the task level
The current state of the processing task
Latitude
The physical place on the landscape where the data was collected
Radius of the buffer around the location (in meters)
Longitude
Organization acronym; the organization that the data belongs to
Full name of the project; a project is the aggregation of media processed to answer a specific scientific question or implement a study design
The status of the project (Active, Test, Private, Map, Map + Report, Published)
Binomial classification (Genus, species) of the species
Species class (taxonomic rank)
English common name of the species
French common name of the species
If split location is checked, the name will be split into new columns ..1, ..2, etc.
A comment about the species tag
The daily mininum temperature at the nearest weather station
The daily maximum temperature at the nearest weather station
The daily mean temperature at the nearest weather station
The daily total rainfall (in millimeters) at the nearest weather station
The daily total snowfall (in centimeters) at the nearest weather station
The daily precipitation (in millimeters) at the nearest weather station
The daily accumulated snowfall (in centimeters) at the nearest weather station
The temperature (in Celsius) recorded at the nearest weather station at the nearest hour
The dewpoint (in Celsius) recorded at the nearest weather station at the nearest hour
The relative humidity (in percent concentration of water vapour present in the air) recorded at the nearest weather station at the nearest hour
The accumalated rainfall (in millimeters) at the nearest weather station at the nearest hour
The wind direction (in degrees) at the nearest weather station at the nearest hour
The wind speed (in kilometers per hour) at the nearest weather station at the nearest hour
The visibility (in kilometers) recorded at the nearest weather at the nearest hour
The atmospheric pressure (in kilopascals) recorded at the nrest weather at the nearest hour
The humidex or humidity index (in celsius) measures how hot the weather feels according to humidity and temperature recorded at the nrest weather at the nearest hour
The windchill or lowering of temperature due to wind speed and air temperature (measured in celsius) recorded at the nearest weather at the nearest hour
The description of the hourly weather at the nearest hour. Options include:
Name of the nearest weather station pulling daily weather conditions
Elevation of the nearest weather station pulling daily weather conditions (in meters)
Distance of the nearest weather station pulling daily weather conditions (in kilometers)
Name of the nearest weather station pulling houly weather conditions
Elevation of the nearest weather station pulling hourly weather conditions (in meters)
Distance of the nearest weather station pulling daily metadata (in kilometers)
